mapper.insert: insert into songs (mid, title, artist, video_id, duration) values (#{mid}, #{title}, #{artist}, #{videoId}, #{duration})
mapper.select: select s.sid, s.mid, s.title, s.artist, s.duration, s.video_id from tracks t join songs s on t.sid = s.sid where jid = #{jid} order by t.track_order desc
select * from songs where mid = #{mid} order by sid desc
mapper.delete: delete from songs where sid = #{sid} and mid = #{mid}
